    • Method Detail

      • getfilteredSchedule

        @Cacheable(value="Schedules")
public Schedule getfilteredSchedule(java.lang.String departure,
                                                                   java.lang.String arrival,
                                                                   java.time.LocalDateTime departureDateTime,
                                                                   java.time.LocalDateTime arrivalDateTime)
        Retrieves the schedule from Ryanair passing the information from the parameters. Filters the information removing the days which are out of our limits. Removes the flights which are not valid as well. Finally, removes the days which have no flights on them (because they have been filtered out).
        Parameters:
        departure -
        arrival -
        departureDateTime -
        arrivalDateTime -
        Returns:
